name: nhs-pds-poller
author: HSCIC
defaultHtmlStyles: * {text-align: center;} .displayInline {display: inline-block} .autoWidth {width: auto;} .minWidth60 {min-width: 60px;} .leftAlign {text-align: left;} .rightAlign {text-align: right;} .floatLeft {float: left;} .floatRight {float: right;} .verticalAlignMiddle {vertical-align: middle;}  .verticalAlignTop {vertical-align: top;} td.notSetDisplay { background-color: #D3D3D3; color: #000000; } td.okDisplay { background-color: #ADEBAD; color: #000000; } td.warningDisplay { background-color: #FFB46A; color: #000000; } td.errorDisplay { background-color: #FF6347; color: #FFFFFF; }
hscicHtmlStyles: body,.hscicText {color:#BF3A3B; background-color: #FFFFFF;} .hscicHeader {color:#FFFFFF; background-color: #BF3A3B} .hscicTable {margin: auto; max-width: 1400px; border-collapse: collapse} .hscicTable td, .hscicTable th {border: 1px solid grey; padding: 5px 10px;} .hscicTable th {font-size: 120%; border-color:#BF3A3B;} .hscicTable.noBorder .noBorder { border: none}
